roleset.name: (cause to) form a curve, forced into a non-straight configuration
roleset.note: BEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bend' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.6, 26.5, 50, and 45.2; Framenet entries Body movement, Posture, and Path shape. Fortunately all of these fit into a single rolest. I think. Sounds better with 'curved'. Oh well, you get the point. (from bend.01-v)

BEND-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb bend.01, OntoNotes grouping bend-n sense 2; maps to VN classes assuming_position-50, bend-45.2, knead-26.5, meander-47.7, spatial_configuration-47.6. Framed by Claire. (from bend.01-n)
BENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on bend-v.01. (from bent.01-j)

roles.note: Verb doesn't have product argument, but examples show this to be necessary. (from bend.01-n)

example.name: bend-v: both args, and directional
example.text: Even that met with Mr. Greenspan's disapproval because [it]-1 might subject the Fed ``to a more intensely political perspective'' and ``could risk *trace*-1 bending monetary policy away from long-term strategic goals.''

example.name: bend-v: intransitive
example.text: But the legislation reflected a compromise agreed to on Tuesday by President Bush and Democratic leaders in Congress, after congressional Republicans urged the [White House]-2 *trace*-2 to bend a bit from its previous resistance to compromise.
example.arg: from its previous resistance to compromise

example.name: bend-v: ergative
example.text: John continued to drive straight, even as the road bent.

example.name: bend-n: Arg 1 only
example.text: With a bend of her knees, she curtsied to the queen.

example.name: bend-n: PRD for end state
example.text: The artist's bend of a piece of wire into the shape of a rabbit amused the children.
example.arg: into the shape of a rabbit

example.name: bend-n: Args 0 & 1
example.text: I knew I must not look openly at the Queen, only notice her bend of the head in return for my low curtsey.

example.name: bending-n: with secondary predication
example.text: His bending the paperclip back and forth and back and forth eventually caused it to snap in two.
example.arg: back and forth and back and forth

example.name: bent-j: arg1
example.text: The mechanic said that my right front wheel was bent.

roleset.name: yield, give way
roleset.note: BEND-V NOTES: No relevant VN class. (from bend.02-v)

example.name: bend-v: uncle! uncle!
example.text: Furthermore, it is also likely to encourage those on Capitol Hill asking for cuts in the assistance to El Salvador if President Cristiani does not bend to demands of the Marxist guerrillas.
example.arg: to demands of the Marxist guerrillas

example.name: the arg
example.text: I ca n't emphasise enough how bent this is , to me .

example.name: better context
example.text: It shows one could not arrest a cop in a 'citizens arrest' without the tables being turned on them, even if the cop was bent or up to no good.

roleset.name: intoxicated (marijuana and alcohol at the same time)
roleset.note: BENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on internet usage. (from bent.04-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: I was once pretty bent on weed and it was messing my grades up n stuff;

roleset.name: mad, upset
roleset.note: BENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from bent.05-j)

example.name: bent-j: both args
example.text: I had to point out that LEOSA had no impact on that situation due to STATE law, and that the local policies [0]-1 he was bent about them not following [*-1]were neither lawful nor good practice as to any cop.

roleset.name: intent on, determined
roleset.note: BENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from bent.02-j)

example.name: bent-j: both args
example.text: I was bent on going to the theater.

roleset.name: flexible
roleset.note: BENDY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to bend.01 (from bendy.01-j)

example.name: bendy-j
example.text: I know , they were n't even bendy anymore
